name: HiPromos Limited
overview:
Hi Promos Limited is a specialist advisory, design, and product supply company set on replacing disposable shopping bags with better, greener choices. We work with a diverse range of clients, from corporate to community organizations, helping them build brand exposure, while also raising awareness for the disposable bag issue. Our expertise in providing creative, premium quality, cost-effective advertising solutions is unmatched. We also offer comprehensive design services, bringing your ideas from original concept to finished product. Our standards are extremely high, and we know yours are too, thatâ€™s why weâ€™ve been very selective in choosing our manufacturing partners. As a result, our superior product quality and fast turnaround time rank us among the best in the industry.

In addition to our unique business model, we are also very different from many of our competitors in that we excel in producing orders of all sizes. Simply put, we put just as much care into an order of 250 bags, as we do an order of 250,000 bags. We believe that repeat business is the only way a company can be truly successful.That is why we make every effort to ensure that our customers are completely satisfied with our products and service.

Hi Promos Limited believes that environmental conservation and protection should be an important consideration for all companies. That is why we only produce eco friendly promotional products. By providing our clients with eco conscious products at a low price, we feel that we are doing much more than practicing good business, we are making a positive difference on the environment as a whole.

Many of our clients share our love for earth and many have come to realize the advantages of using eco friendly promotional products. That is why we strive to produce high quality eco products at prices that make it easy for companies to Go Green!
